column1: Calling hours will be held at French Funeral Home
column2: Gouverneur on Tuesday from 6:00 � 8:00 p.m. and on Wednesday from 2:00 � 4:00 and 7:00 � 9:00 p.m. Her funeral service will be held on Thursday at 11:00 a.m. at the Gouverneur Elks Lodge
